1126560.name: Video deluxe 2020 Plus Steam Edition
1126560.description:
Team up with the ultimate gaming partner in Video Deluxe 2020 Plus - Steam Edition and take your videos to the next level! The numerous new features make editing the videos almost as captivating as gaming itself.

Video editing that's faster than ever before

Our new, ultra-fast INFUSION Engine is your guarantee for smooth and smooth editing of videos. It's up to 8.6x faster than before, providing you with even better performance. The editing tools with new built-in real-time preview keep you on top of the action, even when the action gets hectic. Plus, thanks to the automatic gap removal, you also save a lot of time that you can put directly back into playing games.

Develop your own style

Tailor videos to your personal taste using detailed color correction, a variety of film looks and multicam & 360° editing. Add action to your gameplays with numerous effects, templates and transitions to delight your audience. There's no limit for your creativity now matter whether beginner or pro gamer!

Highlights:

  • NEW! Fast INFUSION Engine
  • NEW! Professional image stabilization
  • NEW! Automatically remove gaps
  • Up to 1,500 effects, titles, templates & transitions
  • Detailed color correction & film looks
  • Import & export in 4K/UHD
  • Multicam & 360° editing
1126560.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
